model.name: loadBalance
model.title: Load Balance
model.description: Balances message processing among a number of nodes
model.label: eip,routing

loadBalancerType.description: The load balancer to be used

inheritErrorHandler.description: Sets whether or not to inherit the configured error handler. The default value is true. You can use this to disable using the inherited error handler for a given DSL such as a load balancer where you want to use a custom error handler strategy.

id.description: Sets the id of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node
